revision.text:
{{wiktionary|black flag}}
'''Black Flag''' or '''black flag''' may refer to:
{{TOC right}} ==Places== * [[Black Flag, Western Australia]], an abandoned town named after the Black Flag gold mine and farm *Black Flag to [[Ora Banda, Western Australia|Ora Banda]] Road, the road in Western Australia on which the abovementioned town is located
==People== * ''The Black Flag'', a ''nom de guerre'' of terror suspect [[Ali Charaf Damache]]
==Flags== *Black flag: ** One of the main [[anarchist symbolism|symbols of anarchism]] ** A type of [[Racing flags#Black flag|racing flag]] ** One of various flags that are primarily black: [[list of black flags]] * [[Black Standard]], legendary flag in Islamic tradition * [[Jolly Roger]], flag associated with piracy * [[Pan-African flag]], a trans-national unity symbol
==Arts, entertainment, and media== * [[Black Flag (band)]], a punk rock band * [[Black Flag (Ektomorf album)|''Black Flag'' (Ektomorf album)]], a 2012 album by Ektomorf * [[Black Flag (Machine Gun Kelly mixtape)|''Black Flag'' (Machine Gun Kelly mixtape)]], 2013 * [[Black Flag (song)|"Black Flag" (song)]], a 1992 song by King's X * [[Black Flag (newspaper)|''Black Flag'' (newspaper)]], a publication in Britain * ''[[Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag]]'', 2013 videogame by Ubisoft * ''[[Black Flags: The Rise of ISIS]]'', a 2015 Pulitzer prize-winning book by Joby Warrick
==Other uses== * [[Black Flag (insecticide)]], a brand of pesticide * [[Black Flag Army]], a militia in Vietnam * [[Chernoe Znamia]] (Чёрное знамя), an organisation in Russia * ''[[Ferraria crispa]]'', a plant also known as black flag
{{disambiguation}}
